Detailed Description

Exposes methods for enumerating INktHook based collections.

Member Function Documentation

HRESULT INktHooksEnum::_NewEnum ( [out, retval] IUnknown **  ppUnk)
get

Retrieves an enumerable collection object.

Parameters
[out,retval]ppUnk Address of an interface pointer that on return points to the IUnknown interface of an enumerator object.
Returns
S_OK on success,
E_POINTER if ppUnk is NULL.
E_FAIL on general failure.
HRESULT INktHooksEnum::Add ( [in] INktHook *  pHook)

Adds a hook to the collection.

Parameters
pHookA pointer to the hook to add.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pHook is NULL.
HRESULT INktHooksEnum::Attach ( [in] VARIANT  procOrId,
[in, defaultvalue(MY_VARIANT_FALSE)] VARIANT_BOOL  sync 
)

Attaches all hooks in this collection to a process.

Parameters
procOrIdVariant specifying to which process to attach. Can be either INktProcess pointer or numeric PID value.
syncIf TRUE, this call waits for operation completion before returning..
Returns
S_OK on success.
NKT_DVERR_NotFound if specified process does not exist.
E_INVALIDARG if process ID is invalid.
E_OUTOFMEMORY if an internal out of memory error has occured.
E_FAIL on general error.
HRESULT INktHooksEnum::Count ( [out, retval] LONG *  pVal)
get

Get the total item count in this collection.

Parameters
[in,out]pValAddress of pointer to receive the item count.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pVal is NULL.
HRESULT INktHooksEnum::Detach ( [in] VARIANT  procOrId,
[in, defaultvalue(MY_VARIANT_FALSE)] VARIANT_BOOL  sync 
)

Detaches all hooks in the collection from a process.

Parameters
procOrIdVariant specifying to which process to attach. Can be either INktProcess pointer or numeric PID value.
syncIf TRUE, this call waits for operation completion before returning.
Returns
S_OK on success.
NKT_DVERR_NotFound if specified process does not exist.
NKT_DVERR_Cancelled if asynchronous detach operation was cancelled.
E_INVALIDARG if process ID is invalid.
E_OUTOFMEMORY if an internal out of memory error has occured.
E_FAIL on general error.
HRESULT INktHooksEnum::Enable ( [in] VARIANT  procOrId,
[in, defaultvalue(MY_VARIANT_FALSE)] VARIANT_BOOL  enable,
[in, defaultvalue(MY_VARIANT_FALSE)] VARIANT_BOOL  sync 
)

Enables or disables all hooks in the collection from the process they are attached on.

Parameters
procOrIdVariant specifying to which process to attach. Can be either INktProcess pointer or numeric PID value.
enableTRUE to enable hook.
syncIf TRUE, this call waits for operation completion before returning.
Returns
S_OK on success.
NKT_DVERR_NotFound if specified process does not exist.
NKT_DVERR_Cancelled if asynchronous detach operation was cancelled.
E_INVALIDARG if process ID is invalid.
E_OUTOFMEMORY if an internal out of memory error has occured.
E_FAIL on general error..
HRESULT INktHooksEnum::First ( [out, retval] INktHook **  ppHook)

Retrieves the first item in the collection.

Parameters
[in,out]ppHookAddress of pointer to receive the item.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_FAIL if item not found.
HRESULT INktHooksEnum::GetAt ( [in] LONG  index,
[out, retval] INktHook **  ppHook 
)

Retrieves the item at the specified index.

Parameters
indexZero-based index.
[in,out]ppHookAddress of pointer to receive the item.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_INVALIDARG if index parameter is out of bounds.
HRESULT INktHooksEnum::GetByDeviareId ( [in] my_ssize_t  devId,
[out, retval] INktHook **  ppHook 
)

Find an item by its deviare id.

Parameters
devIdThe ID to search for.
[in,out]ppHookAddress of pointer to receive the item.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_INVALIDARG if devId is invalid.
NKTDV_ERR_NotFound if item not found (ppHook is set to NULL).
HRESULT INktHooksEnum::GetById ( [in] my_ssize_t  id,
[out, retval] INktHook **  ppHook 
)

Find a hook by its id.

Parameters
idThe ID to search for.
[in,out]ppHookAddress of pointer to receive the item.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_INVALIDARG if Id is invalid.
NKTDV_ERR_NotFound if item not found (ppHook is set to NULL).
S_OK or E_FAIL.
HRESULT INktHooksEnum::Hook ( [in, defaultvalue(MY_VARIANT_FALSE)] VARIANT_BOOL  sync)

Activate all the hooks in the collection.

Parameters
syncIf TRUE, this call waits for operation completion before returning.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_FAIL on error condition.
HRESULT INktHooksEnum::Last ( [out, retval] INktHook **  ppHook)

Retrieves the last item in the collection.

Parameters
[in,out]ppHookAddress of pointer to receive the item.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_FAIL if item not found.
HRESULT INktHooksEnum::Next ( [out, retval] INktHook **  ppHook)

Retrieves the next item in the collection.

Parameters
[in,out]ppHookAddress of pointer to receive the item.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_FAIL if item not found.
HRESULT INktHooksEnum::Previous ( [out, retval] INktHook **  ppHook)

Retrieves the previous item in the collection.

Parameters
[in,out]ppHookAddress of pointer to receive the item.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_FAIL if item not found.
HRESULT INktHooksEnum::QueryOverwrite ( [in] VARIANT  procOrId,
[out, retval] VARIANT *  pVal 
)

Checks if the hook was overwritten in the specified process.

Parameters
[in]procOrIdVariant specifying process to query. Can be either INktProcess pointer or numeric PID value.
[out]pValAddress of pointer to receive the boolean result.
Returns
S_OK on success,
E_POINTER if pVal is NULL.
HRESULT INktHooksEnum::Unhook ( [in, defaultvalue(MY_VARIANT_FALSE)] VARIANT_BOOL  sync)

Deactivate all the hooks in the collection.

Parameters
syncIf TRUE, this call waits for operation completion before returning.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_FAIL on error condition.
